function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Racial stereotypes perpetuated by COVID medical studies influencing brand decisions.","Impact":"Perpetuation of racial biases, potential to harm brand reputation and community sentiment.","Mitigation":"Ensure ethical and culturally sensitive research and communication, promote diversity and inclusion in decision-making.","Technologies":"Ethical AI, sentiment analysis tools, diversity and inclusion training.","People":"BAME individuals, communities affected by racial stereotypes, employees and stakeholders of the brands.","Owner":"Research institutions, brand executives, diversity and inclusion advocates."},{"Description":"Risks of mishandling past depictions of slavery in media and entertainment.","Impact":"Reinforcement of harmful stereotypes, potential to offend and alienate audiences.","Mitigation":"Ethical storytelling, historical accuracy, responsible content warnings.","Technologies":"Content moderation tools, historical research databases, cultural sensitivity training.","People":"Audiences, communities affected by historical trauma, content creators and producers.","Owner":"Media and entertainment industry, historians, content creators."},{"Description":"Theorizing and human connectedness in pandemic research impacting societal trust and organizational resilience.","Impact":"Misinformation, erosion of trust, hindered organizational recovery.","Mitigation":"Evidence-based communication, transparent information sharing, community engagement.","Technologies":"Data analytics, communication platforms, community engagement tools.","People":"Researchers, public health officials, communities affected by pandemics, organizational leaders.","Owner":"Research institutions, public health agencies, organizational leaders."}]}
